column1: Santo Antônio de Jesus is a city in the eastern part of the state of Bahia
column3: located west of the state capital Salvador. It is part of the mesoregion Metropolitana de Salvador. The population is 100
column4: 605 (2018 est.) in an area of 261.35 km². It is an important commercial and a service centre in the micro-region.

column2: a five-time champion for the Brazilian national football team of football (soccer).
